replies.body:
Ok, that makes since :p if it's done on a majority vote then it would be next to impossible to abuse.


I just wan't the system back so i can at least feel like i'm making this game less toxic.

I have never had the chance to use that feature but i would like to one day, if they ever bring it back. i know some people don't like the Tribunal and say it doesn't work but it's actually a good idea. I believe Dota uses a similar feature and it has been working for them.

People don't see the difference it makes and say it's useless but one thing to remember is that league has a player base of over 50 million people, that's more then some small countries and it takes a while to effect the attitudes of millions or to see that change begin for that matter.

Sure the tribunal can be abused because lets face it not everyone using the system will care and because of this will vote what ever they want regardless of the evidence in front of them.

That being said the majority will use the tribunal as Riot intends because they care about the game there are playing and want to make it better.

So lets hurry Riot and get that back up :)

> Sure the tribunal can be abused because lets face it not everyone using the system will care and because of this will vote what ever they want regardless of the evidence in front of them.

It takes a serious majority to punish someone, so the system can't really be abused and unless I'm wrong someone from Riot review the case before punishing after people vote.
